trans-unit.source: Provides a standard set of media related commands.
trans-unit.target: 提供媒体相关命令的标准集。

trans-unit.source: The commands in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MediaCommands> class and commands in the other command library classes, such as <xref:System.Windows.Input.ComponentCommands> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands>, are intended to represent a set of common commands that application programmers encounter frequently.
trans-unit.target: 中的命令<xref:System.Windows.Input.MediaCommands>类和另一部分中的命令命令库类，如<xref:System.Windows.Input.ComponentCommands>和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands>，用于表示一组的应用程序程序员经常遇到的常见命令。

trans-unit.source: The commands only represent the instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand> and not the implementation logic for the command.
trans-unit.target: 命令仅表示的实例<xref:System.Windows.Input.RoutedCommand>不实现逻辑的命令。

trans-unit.source: The implementation logic is bound to the command via a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.CommandBindings%2A>.

For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MediaCommands.Play%2A> command is executed on a control (the command target), the logic which performs the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MediaCommands.Play%2A> command may not be provided by the command target, so the application writer will be responsible for writing the logic that determines how the command target will handle the command.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Windows.Input.MediaCommands.Play%2A>控件 （命令目标），后者将执行的逻辑上执行命令<xref:System.Windows.Input.MediaCommands.Play%2A>命令可能无法提供命令目标，因此应用程序编写器将负责编写逻辑确定如何对命令目标将处理该命令。

trans-unit.source: Many controls do provide implementation logic for many of the commands in the command library.
trans-unit.target: 许多控件对于许多命令库中的命令提供实现逻辑。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox> class provides logic for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Paste%2A> command, <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Cut%2A> command, <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Copy%2A> command, <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Undo%2A> command, and <xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Redo%2A> command.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBox>类提供了逻辑<xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Paste%2A>命令，<xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Cut%2A>命令，<xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Copy%2A>命令，<xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Undo%2A>命令，和<xref:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Redo%2A>命令。

trans-unit.source: For more information on commands and commanding see the [Commanding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息命令和命令，请参阅[命令概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/commanding-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that represents the Boost Base command.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示“提升基础”命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to toggle the bass boost on or off.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示打开或关闭低音增强的意图。

trans-unit.source: There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer.
trans-unit.target: 并不一定对任何给定的对象; 上的命令的响应的实际实现在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that represents the Channel Down command.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示 Channel Down 命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to decrement the channel value.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示要递减的通道值的意图。

trans-unit.source: There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer.
trans-unit.target: 并不一定对任何给定的对象; 上的命令的响应的实际实现在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to increment the channel value.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示通道值增量的意图。

trans-unit.target: 获取表示“下一曲目”命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to select the next track.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示选择下一曲目的目的。

trans-unit.target: 获取表示“暂停”命令的值。

trans-unit.target: 此命令指示打算暂停播放。

trans-unit.target: 获取表示“播放”命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to begin playing at the current position.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示开始播放位于当前位置的意图。

trans-unit.source: There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer.

trans-unit.target: 获取表示 Previous Track 命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to select the previous track.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示选择上一曲目的目的。

trans-unit.source: There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer.

trans-unit.target: 获取表示“记录”命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to begin recording.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示开始录制的意图。

trans-unit.source: There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that represents the Rewind command.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示“后退”命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to reverse playback.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示打算反向播放。

trans-unit.source: There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer.
trans-unit.target: 并不一定对任何给定的对象; 上的命令的响应的实际实现在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that represents the Select command.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示“选择”命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to put the media in select mode.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示打算将媒体放在选择模式下。

trans-unit.source: There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer.
trans-unit.target: 并不一定对任何给定的对象; 上的命令的响应的实际实现在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that represents the Stop command.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示“停止”命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to stop playback.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示打算停止播放。

trans-unit.source: There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that represents the Toggle Microphone On Off command.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示“打开/关闭麦克风”命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to toggle the microphone on or off.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示打开或关闭麦克风的意图。

trans-unit.source: There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer.
trans-unit.target: 并不一定对任何给定的对象; 上的命令的响应的实际实现在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value that represents the Toggle Play Pause command.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示“切换播放暂停”命令的值。

trans-unit.source: This command indicates the intention to toggle playback between play and pause.
trans-unit.target: 此命令指示打算切换之间播放和暂停播放。

trans-unit.source: There is not necessarily an actual implementation responding to the command on any given object; in many cases the implementation in response to that command is the responsibility of the application writer.
trans-unit.target: 并不一定对任何给定的对象; 上的命令的响应的实际实现在许多情况下对该命令的响应中的实现是应用程序编写器的责任。
